techniques.name: CPU Architecture Fundamentals
techniques.description: CPU pipelines, instruction execution, caches, branch predictors

techniques.name: Side-Channel Attack Introduction
techniques.description: Classification and overview of all side-channel attack types

techniques.name: Threat Models for Side-Channels
techniques.description: Adversary capabilities, assumptions, and realistic scenarios

techniques.name: CPU Cache Hierarchy
techniques.description: Cache organization, replacement policies (LRU), coherence protocols

techniques.name: Cache Replacement Policy Analysis
techniques.description: Exploit LRU/pseudo-LRU replacement decisions

techniques.name: TLB Side-Channel Analysis
techniques.description: TLB entries leak virtual address patterns

techniques.name: Branch Predictor Analysis
techniques.description: Infer branch outcomes through timing analysis

techniques.name: DRAM Row Hammer Attack
techniques.description: Exploit DRAM refresh mechanisms to flip memory bits

techniques.name: Memory Hierarchy Timing Leaks
techniques.description: Measure access times at different cache levels

techniques.name: Spectre v1 (Bounds Check Bypass)
techniques.description: Bypass bounds checks via speculative execution to leak data

techniques.name: Spectre v2 (Branch Target Injection)
techniques.description: Poison branch prediction buffer (BTB) to redirect indirect branches

techniques.name: Meltdown (Rogue Data Cache Load)
techniques.description: Read arbitrary kernel memory via exception handling race condition

techniques.name: Rogue System Register Read
techniques.description: Read privileged system registers through speculative execution

techniques.name: Pattern History Table (PHT) Poisoning
techniques.description: Poison PHT entries to control speculative execution

techniques.name: Indirect Branch Prediction Poisoning
techniques.description: Exploit indirect branch misprediction for information leakage

techniques.name: Return-Oriented Programming (ROP)
techniques.description: Chain gadgets to execute arbitrary code via speculative execution

techniques.name: Simple Power Analysis (SPA)
techniques.description: Visual inspection of power traces to identify operations

techniques.name: Differential Power Analysis (DPA)
techniques.description: Statistical analysis of power differences to extract keys

techniques.name: Correlation Power Analysis (CPA)
techniques.description: Correlate power with key hypotheses to recover AES/RSA keys

techniques.name: Mutual Information Analysis (MIA)
techniques.description: Information-theoretic power analysis attack

techniques.name: Stochastic Models for Power Analysis
techniques.description: Model power consumption stochastically for attacks

techniques.name: Template Attacks (Profiling)
techniques.description: Build templates via machine learning on power traces

techniques.name: Power Masking (Countermeasure)
techniques.description: Add noise to power consumption to hide operations

techniques.name: Random Delays (Countermeasure)
techniques.description: Randomize execution time to desynchronize traces

techniques.name: Timing Attack on Cryptographic Operations
techniques.description: Extract keys from variable execution times

techniques.name: Cache-Timing Attack Fundamentals
techniques.description: Infer memory access patterns from cache timing

techniques.name: Flush+Reload Cache Attack
techniques.description: Flush cache lines and measure reload time

techniques.name: Prime+Probe Cache Attack
techniques.description: Prime cache with victim's data, probe eviction patterns

techniques.name: Evict+Time Cache Attack
techniques.description: Measure access time after evicting victim's cache line

techniques.name: Spectre via Cache Timing
techniques.description: Use cache-timing to read results of speculative execution

techniques.name: Constant-Time Implementation (Defense)
techniques.description: Write cryptographic code to avoid timing leaks

techniques.name: Electromagnetic Analysis (EMA)
techniques.description: Recover keys from CPU EM emissions

techniques.name: Van Eck Phreaking (Display Emissions)
techniques.description: Recover display contents from EM emissions

techniques.name: Acoustic Cryptanalysis
techniques.description: Extract keys from CPU acoustic emissions

techniques.name: Acoustic RSA Key Extraction
techniques.description: Recover full RSA keys from acoustic side-channel

techniques.name: Thermal Imaging Side-Channel
techniques.description: Infer operations from thermal patterns

techniques.name: Optical Side-Channels (LED/Display)
techniques.description: Leak information from optical emissions

techniques.name: Power Line Coupling Attack
techniques.description: Measure power via power supply line at distance

techniques.name: Fault Injection Attacks (Overview)
techniques.description: Induce faults to extract cryptographic keys

techniques.name: Clock Glitching Attack
techniques.description: Manipulate clock signal to cause instruction skips

techniques.name: Voltage Glitching Attack
techniques.description: Manipulate voltage to induce bit flips

techniques.name: Laser Fault Injection
techniques.description: Use laser pulses to induce faults in silicon

techniques.name: Differential Fault Analysis (DFA)
techniques.description: Analyze differences between correct/faulty outputs to recover keys

techniques.name: Electromagnetic Fault Injection
techniques.description: Use EM pulses to induce faults without physical contact
